aima.core.util.math.geom.shapes

Class Ellipse2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • aima.core.util.math.geom.shapes.Ellipse2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGeometric2D

    public class Ellipse2D
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGeometric2D
    This class implements an ellipse in a two-dimensional Cartesian plot.
    As an ellipse can be rotated around its center it is represented by a center Point2D and two Vector2D that are the horizontal and vertical radius.
    Author:
    Arno von Borries, Jan Phillip Kretzschmar, Andreas Walscheid

        Parameters:

        public Point2D randomPoint()
        Description copied from interface: IGeometric2D

        Specified by:

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
